in-app-purchases.restoreNoProductsDescription: We couldn't find any purchases to restore per your account
in-app-purchases.errorProductOwnedDescription: Please restore your purchases to reactivate product
in-app-purchases.errorDeferredPaymentDescription: Your purchase is awaiting approval from the parental control
in-app-purchases.errorReceiptValidationTitle: We're having trouble validating your transaction
in-app-purchases.errorReceiptValidationDescription: Give us some time, we'll retry to validate your transaction as soon as possible
in-app-purchases.errorReceiptInvalidDescription: We were not able to process your purchase, if you've been charged please contact the support
in-app-purchases.errorReceiptRequestTitle: We're having trouble validating your transaction
in-app-purchases.errorReceiptRequestDescription: Please try to restore your purchases later or contact the support
in-app-purchases.errorGenericPurchaseDescription: We were not able to process your purchase, please try again later or contact the support
in-app-purchases.errorGenericRestoreDescription: We were not able to restore your purchases, please try again later or contact the support
